pages.text: Created with all the knowledge you have gathered, you have created the Spirit Instiller. It serves to be able to connect the energies of two items, with the help of a third object to bind them.$(br)An almost spiritual process.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Spirit Instiller needs a focus structure to work. To rotate the structure hologram in the direction you want it to, click on the placed Spirit Instiller itself.

pages.name: Instiller Structure
pages.text: The Spirit Instiller's abilities can be enhanced via $(l:magical_blocks/upgrades)Upgrades$(). Place them on the two Onyx Chiseled Blocks.

pages.title: Block Checklist
pages.text: $(li)1 Spirit Instiller$(li)2 Item Bowls$(li)2 Notched Polished Blocks$(li)2 Chiseled Polished Blocks$(li)2 Onyx Chiseled Blocks$(li)6 Polished Pillars$(li)17 Polished Slabs$(li)41 Polished Blocks$(li)2 Gemstone Chimes
